SELECT id AS id, mobile AS mobile, user_name AS userName, pass_word AS passWord, level_num AS levelNum, account AS account, school_id AS schoolId, user_exper AS userExper, life_num AS lifeNum FROM game_user WHERE user_name = #{userName}
AND pass_word = #{passWord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game_user (mobile, user_name, pass_word, mark, add_time) VALUES (#{mobile}, #{userName}, #{passWord}, #{mark}, #{addTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE game_user SET school_id = #{schoolId} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE game_user set master_id = #{masterId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.`user_name` , a.`nick_name` , b.id AS school_id, b.`name` AS school_name , c.`id` AS master_id, c.`name` AS master_name FROM game_user a LEFT JOIN game_school b ON a.`school_id` = b.`id` LEFT JOIN game_master c ON a.`master_id` = c.`id` WHERE a.id = #{userId}

SELECT b.`name` AS gest_name, b.`id` AS gest_id, c.`id` AS art_id, c.`name` AS art_name FROM game_user_gest_art a LEFT JOIN game_gest b ON a.`gest_id` = b.`id` LEFT JOIN game_art c ON a.`art_id` = c.`id` WHERE a.`user_id` = #{userId}
SELECT b.`name` AS goods_name, a.`goods_num`,a.`user_id` FROM game_user_goods a LEFT JOIN game_goods b ON a.`goods_id` = b.`id` WHERE a.`user_id` = #{userId]
